body: This special ability can only be placed on one-handed or two-handed firearms. A greater lucky firearm is nearly identical to a lucky firearm, but its reservoir holds 3 grit points instead of 1. A firearm cannot have both this special ability and the lucky special ability.
name: Lucky, Greater
